events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and a tree on the morning of June 1st with significant front-end damage.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and damage description.
An claims agent specializing in vehicle accidents has been assigned to this case for further processing.
Customer received official acknowledgment of their accident claim and was informed about the next steps.
Request sent to customer for photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and insurance papers.
Customer submitted the requested documents including detailed photos and the police accident report promptly.
Investigation into the circumstances of the collision and assessment of vehicle damage has officially begun.
The investigation concluded that the accident was accidental and liable for policy coverage.
A settlement offer was made to cover vehicle repair costs based on the damage assessment report.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and appreciated the quick handling of their case.
Claim has been approved in full following customer's acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Settlement payment was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover all approved repair expenses.
The claim has been officially closed after successful payment and resolution to the satisfaction of the claimant.
Processed claim record has been archived for future reference and compliance with company policy.
